00016 #include "osystem.h"
00017 #include "Observer.h"

00019 namespace omega
00020 {
00022 // Forward declarations
00023 class SystemManager;
00024 
00026 class DisplaySystem
00027 {
00028 public:
00029         virtual ~DisplaySystem() {}
00030 
00031         // sets up the display system. Called before initalize.
00032         virtual void setup(Setting& setting) {}
00033 
00034         // initializes the display system
00035         virtual void initialize(SystemManager* sys) {}
00036 
00037         // Starts display system rendering. This call does not return until the current omegalib application sends an
00038         // exit request to the system manager.
00039         virtual void run() = 0;
00040 
00041         // Layer and view management.
00042         virtual void setLayerEnabled(int layerNum, const char* viewName, bool enabled) {}
00043         virtual bool isLayerEnabled(int layerNum, const char* viewName) { return true;}
00044 
00045         virtual Observer* getObserver(int observerId) { return NULL; }
00046         
00047         virtual void cleanup() {}
00048 
00049         virtual unsigned int getId() { return -1; }
00050 
00051 protected:
00052         DisplaySystem() {}
00053 };
00054 
00055 }; // namespace omega
